benchmark_details.name: PlanBench
benchmark_details.overview: A benchmark suite for evaluating language models on various planning and scheduling tasks, featuring established benchmarks and extending them for more complex planning problems.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate and improve the planning and scheduling capabilities of language models, specifically the new Large Reasoning Models (LRM).

data.source: Static test sets from IPC planning problems (e.g., Blocksworld, Logistics, Sokoban)
data.annotation: Automatically generated problem representations with conditions.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy calculated as the proportion of correctly solved instances on the defined benchmarks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better reasoning capability of the language models on planning tasks.
methodology.baseline_results: Need for further refinement; specific models and their results vary across benchmarks.
methodology.validation: Compared against classical planning methods and previous state-of-the-art results.
